Articles.Content:
Hello

Any mod on .90 that allows to select throttle through a panel like the old "hydrotech" ?

Interest is you can select a precise value like 12% or any value you need.

MechJeb has this feature (in Utility, I think).

RemoteTech also have a % thrust slider/box, though I've never used it.

A standalone (thus, light) mod that does exactly this might be nice, still.
